sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
Retrieves details of the specified volume backup policy.

Inputs :

  • Compartment ID - The OCID of the compartment.
  • Policy ID - OCID of the volume backup policy.

Outputs :

  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to "Success". If there is a failure, Status is set to "Error".
  • Error Message - Reason for error, along with code. Populated only when an error occurs.
  • Volume Backup Policy ID - OCID of the volume backup policy.
  • Compartment ID - OCID of the compartment.
  • Display Name - Name of the volume.
  • Time Created - Date and time the volume backup policy was created.
  • Lifecycle State - Current state of the volume backup policy.
  • Destination Region - The paired destination region for copying scheduled backups to.
  • Defined Tags - Defined tags for this resource.
  • Free-form Tags - Free-form tags for this resource.
  • schedules - Complex object containing the details of the schedule.

Error Messages :

  • Bad Request.
  • Unauthorized.
  • Not Found.
  • Internal Server Error.

To use this action, the corresponding Oracle connection and credential must be created and associated with the Oracle Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.

sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.description:
Retrieves details of the specified volume backup policy.

Inputs :

  • Compartment ID - The OCID of the compartment.
  • Policy ID - OCID of the volume backup policy.

Outputs :

  • Status - If the request is executed successfully, Status is set to "Success". If there is a failure, Status is set to "Error".
  • Error Message - Reason for error, along with code. Populated only when an error occurs.
  • Volume Backup Policy ID - OCID of the volume backup policy.
  • Compartment ID - OCID of the compartment.
  • Display Name - Name of the volume.
  • Time Created - Date and time the volume backup policy was created.
  • Lifecycle State - Current state of the volume backup policy.
  • Destination Region - The paired destination region for copying scheduled backups to.
  • Defined Tags - Defined tags for this resource.
  • Free-form Tags - Free-form tags for this resource.
  • schedules - Complex object containing the details of the schedule.

Error Messages :

  • Bad Request.
  • Unauthorized.
  • Not Found.
  • Internal Server Error.

To use this action, the corresponding Oracle connection and credential must be created and associated with the Oracle Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
